scripts.build: npm run build:ts && npm run ensure:mcp
scripts.build:mcp: cd ../mcp-local-main && npm install && npm run build
scripts.build:mcp:optional: npm run build:mcp || echo '⚠️  MCP build skipped (mcp-local-main not found - will use pre-bundled version)'
scripts.copy:mcp:optional: node scripts/copy-mcp.js || echo '⚠️  MCP copy skipped (will use pre-bundled version)'
scripts.ensure:mcp: test -f dist/mcp-server/index.js && echo '✅ Using pre-bundled MCP server' || (npm run build:mcp:optional && npm run copy:mcp:optional && test -f dist/mcp-server/index.js && echo '✅ Built and bundled MCP server' || (echo '❌ ERROR: MCP server not found and could not be built!' && exit 1))
scripts.verify:mcp: test -f dist/mcp-server/index.js && echo '✅ MCP server found' || (echo '❌ MCP server not found!' && exit 1)
